title: TPB Comments (SQL File) *PROPER.UTF8*
description:
Sorry for my former upload that had the latin1 charset and had special and foreign chars messed up. This one is UTF8, i double checked it worked.

This torrent contains every comment to all torrents in the TPB index torrent (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5053827).

It is a MySQL SQL file, but is probably readable by other database engines as well.

Fields of the table:
id - primary key / autoincrement
torrentid - id of the torrent
user - user writing the comment
time - unix timestamp
comment - the comment itself

The script i wrote to create this sql can be found here: <a href="
http://paste2.org/p/395750" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://paste2.org/p/395750</a>
